body_html:
As far as I remember using expand has some memory issues when used with CUDA. repeat would likely give better performance. I can't remember what was the cause of the slowdown. @soumith?

Apparently something similar happens on the CPU too (likely because of some cache issues). If I use expand I get 0.017s for forward and 1.455s for backward, if I switch it to repeat(inp.size(0), 1, 1) they take 0.186s and 0.519s respectively.

body:
As far as I remember using expand has some memory issues when used with CUDA. `repeat` would likely give better performance. I can't remember what was the cause of the slowdown. @soumith?

Apparently something similar happens on the CPU too (likely because of some cache issues). If I use `expand` I get 0.017s for forward and 1.455s for backward, if I switch it to `repeat(inp.size(0), 1, 1)` they take 0.186s and 0.519s respectively.
